Package edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz

package edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz
An example of the Observer patterns inspired by https://plantsvszombies.fandom.com/wiki/Plants_vs._Zombies_Heroes The set up is there are plants and zombies on the board the game is the subject and it can be observed for Attack, Bonus Attack, and Destroyed events. The way this game works is the game iterates through the game pieces tells them to do actions. When a plant does an action it attacks a random zombie, and when a zombie does an action it attacks a random plant. Plants have a special type of plant RepeatShooter that after attacking will do a bonus attack. Zombies have a special type of zombie, a Mime, that usually doesn't do a bonus attack, but if it observes a bonus attack it will do a bonus attack. However, to prevent an infinite loop it does a bonus attack for anything that does a bonus attack EXCEPT another Mime.
  • Class
    Description
    ConsoleEventObserver
    This observer will monitor for the specified event type and when it occurs it will output that the event occured to the console.
    Event
    A game event that holds the cause of the event and the event type.
    EventType
    Enumeration of event types.
    Game
    Simple game Singleton that keeps track of a list of plants and zombies that can be a subject for observation of game events.
    GameEventObserver
    Interface for classes that want to observe game event subjects.
    GamePiece
    Represents a game piece for this game.
    GameSubject
    A Game Event subject that can be observed for game events.
    Main
    This demo of the the Observer pattern that occurs in Plants vs Zombies Heroes where one type of zombie (a Mime) observes the game and if any game piece does a bonus attack it mimics it and also carries out a bonus attack
    Mime
    This class demonstrates ways the Observer pattern can be used in different ways.
    Plant
    Plant game piece
    RepeatShooter
    Plants that extend this class after caring out their initial attack, then execute a bonus attack
    Zombie
    Represents a zombie game piece
